summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Bellevue Court, in the City of Seattle, from Bellevue Place to Belmont Avenue North, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1559 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
